description: This file defines a React component 'Costs' for rendering a costs overview page with data fetched via an API client. It includes sub-functions for formatting currency and utilizes React hooks for state and effect management.

methods.name: Costs
methods.description: React functional component that displays cost summary, breakdowns by provider and region, and handles data fetching and user interaction.

methods.name: formatCurrency
methods.description: Formats a numeric value into a currency string, with fallback to a simple dollar formatting.
